an5.237:4.1: “Mendicants, a resident mendicant with five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.237:4.3: Without examining or scrutinizing, they praise those deserving of criticism, and they criticize those deserving of praise.
an5.237:4.5: They’re stingy and greedy regarding monasteries.
an5.237:4.6: They’re stingy and greedy regarding families.
an5.237:4.7: And they waste a gift given in faith.
an5.237:4.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is cast down to hell.
an5.237:5.1: A resident mendicant with five qualities is raised up to heaven.
an5.237:5.3: After examining and scrutinizing, they criticize those deserving of criticism, and they praise those deserving of praise.
an5.237:5.5: They’re not stingy and greedy regarding monasteries.
an5.237:5.6: They’re not stingy and greedy regarding families.
an5.237:5.7: And they don’t waste a gift given in faith.
an5.237:5.8: A resident mendicant with these five qualities is raised up to heaven.”
